titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MICROSCOPIC INVOLVEMENT INDICATION CODE (FALLOPIAN TUBE) - Description

body.p: MICROSCOPIC INVOLVEMENT INDICATION CODE (FALLOPIAN TUBE) is the same as attribute MICROSCOPIC INVOLVEMENT INDICATION CODE FOR FALLOPIAN TUBE OR OVARIAN CANCER , to indicate if there is microscopic involvement of fallopian tubes during a Gynaecological Cancer Care Spell .
